TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProfileProvider extends System.Configuration.SettingsProvider
Public MustInherit Class ProfileProvider Inherits SettingsProvider
public ref class ProfileProvider abstract : System::Configuration::SettingsProvider

summary.span: 定義合約，由 ASP.NET 實作，使用自訂設定檔提供者來提供設定檔服務。

span.span: Defines the contract that ASP.NET implements to provide profile services using custom profile providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 設定檔提供永續性儲存體和擷取使用者特定屬性。ASP.NET profiles offer persistent storage and retrieval of user-specific properties. 設定檔屬性值和資訊會儲存在資料來源的方式取決於實作。Profile property values and information are stored in a data source in a manner determined by the implementation. 您可以使用隨附於.NET Framework 的設定檔提供者 (由衍生自類別抽象類別)，或者您可以實作自己的提供者藉由建立新的類別衍生自。You can use the profile providers that are included with the .NET Framework (represented by the classes that derive from the abstract class), or you can implement your own provider by creating a new class that derives from . 有兩個建立自訂設定檔提供者的主要原因。There are two primary reasons for creating a custom profile provider. - 您要將設定檔資訊儲存在隨附於.NET Framework 中，例如 FoxPro 資料庫、 Oracle 資料庫或其他資料存放區的設定檔提供者不支援的資料來源。You need to store profile information in a data source that is not supported by the profile providers included with the .NET Framework, such as a FoxPro database, an Oracle database, or other data stores. - 您要管理使用不同於.NET Framework 所隨附的提供者所使用的資料庫結構描述的資料庫結構描述的設定檔資訊。You need to manage profile information using a database schema that is different from the database schema used by the providers that ship with the .NET Framework. 常見的例子，這是已經在公司網路或網站的 SQL Server 資料庫的使用者資料。A common example of this would be user data that already exists in a SQL Server database for a company network or a Web site. 抽象類別繼承自抽象類別，繼承自抽象類別。The abstract class inherits from the abstract class, which inherits from the abstract class. 類別實作也必須實作的所需的成員和抽象類別。Classes that implement must also implement the required members of the and abstract classes. 如需有關如何實作設定檔提供者的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作設定檔提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98)。For more information about implementing a profile provider, see [Implementing a Profile Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/58de6e99-31a7-41b9-93ed-51b9b4a67e98). ## Examples 如需實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa).

span.span: Implementing a Profile Provider
ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您不需要實作繼承的類別的建構函式抽象類別。You are not required to implement a constructor for a class that inherits the abstract class. 初始化值實作會傳遞至方法實作。Initialization values for a implementation are passed to the method implementation.

Public MustOverride Function DeleteInactiveProfiles (authenticationOption As ProfileAuthenticationOption, userInactiveSinceDate As DateTime) As Integer
public: abstract int DeleteInactiveProfiles(System::Web::Profile::ProfileAuthenticationOption authenticationOption, DateTime userInactiveSinceDate);
abstract member DeleteInactiveProfiles : System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption * DateTime -> int

param.name: authenticationOption
param.span: 的其中一個值，指定是否要刪除匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

span.span: One of the values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are deleted.

param.name: userInactiveSinceDate
param.span: ，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

param.span: 如果使用者設定檔的 值發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將設定檔視為非現用。

span.span: If the value of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

summary.span: 在衍生的類別中覆寫時，會刪除上次活動日期發生在指定日期之前的設定檔中所有使用者設定檔資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes all user-profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred before the specified date.

returns.span: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

span.span: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來從資料來源中移除未使用的設定檔資料。The method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source. 只有資料`applicationName`指定組態中移除檔案。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is removed. `authenticationOption`參數會指定是否只是匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔，或會搜尋所有設定檔。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 在其中設定檔當天或之前指定，就會發生`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值會被刪除。Profiles in which the occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value are deleted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作的方法簽章方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 如需完整的範例實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/CS/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/VB/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.vb#3)]

param.name: usernames

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會針對符合提供的使用者名稱清單之設定檔，刪除這些設定檔的屬性和資訊。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, deletes profile properties and information for profiles that match the supplied list of user names.

returns.span: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

span.span: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會刪除設定檔中指定`usernames`參數。The method deletes the profiles specified in the `usernames` parameter. 只有資料`applicationName`指定組態中移除檔案。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is removed. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作的方法簽章方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 如需完整的範例實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). param.span: ，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會擷取上次活動日期發生在指定的日期或之前，且使用者名稱符合指定的使用者名稱之設定檔的設定檔資訊。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves profile information for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and the user name matches the specified user name.

returns.span: ，包含非現用設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊，其中使用者名稱符合所提供的 參數。

span.span: A containing user profile information for inactive profiles where the user name matches the supplied parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來擷取使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔的未使用的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊`usernameToMatch`參數。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for profiles in which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter. 只有資料`applicationName`組態中指定，會傳回檔案。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`參數會指定是否只是匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔，或會搜尋所有設定檔。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔，與，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`傳回參數的值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 如果您的資料來源支援的其他搜尋功能，例如萬用字元，您可以提供更豐富的搜尋功能的使用者名稱。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for user names. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回，其中的零識別的第一頁的結果。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值是 1`pageSize`為 5，傳回會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個非使用中的設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作的方法簽章方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 如需完整的範例實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/CS/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/VB/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回一份設定檔的使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔資訊`usernameToMatch`參數。The method returns a list of profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter. 只有資料`applicationName`組態中指定，會傳回檔案。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`參數會指定是否只是匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔，或會搜尋所有設定檔。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 如果您的資料來源支援的其他搜尋功能，例如萬用字元，您可以提供更豐富的搜尋功能的使用者名稱。If your data source supports additional search capabilities, such as wildcard characters, you can provide more extensive search capabilities for user names. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回，其中的零識別的第一頁的結果。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值是 1`pageSize`為 5，傳回會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個非使用中的設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作的方法簽章方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 如需完整的範例實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection GetAllInactiveProfiles(valuetype System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption authenticationOption, valuetype System.DateTime userInactiveSinceDate, int32 pageIndex, int32 pageSize, [out] int32& totalRecords) cil managed

Public MustOverride Function GetAllInactiveProfiles (authenticationOption As ProfileAuthenticationOption, userInactiveSinceDate As DateTime, pageIndex As Integer, pageSize As Integer, ByRef totalRecords As Integer) As ProfileInfoCollection

public: abstract System::Web::Profile::ProfileInfoCollection ^ GetAllInactiveProfiles(System::Web::Profile::ProfileAuthenticationOption authenticationOption, DateTime userInactiveSinceDate, int pageIndex, int pageSize, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % totalRecords);
abstract member GetAllInactiveProfiles : System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption * DateTime * int * int * -> System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection

param.name: authenticationOption
param.span: 的其中一個值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

span.span: One of the values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.

param.name: userInactiveSinceDate
param.span: ，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

span.span: A that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.

param.span: 如果使用者設定檔的 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

span.span: If the of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.

param.name: pageIndex
param.span: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

span.span: The index of the page of results to return.

param.name: pageSize
param.span: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

span.span: The size of the page of results to return.

param.span: 當方法回傳時，包含設定檔的總數。

summary.span: 在衍生的類別中覆寫時，會從資料來源擷取上次活動日期發生在指定日期當天或之前的設定檔之使用者設定檔資料。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves user-profile data from the data source for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date.

returns.span: ，包含關於非現用設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊。

span.span: A containing user-profile information about the inactive profiles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來擷取未使用的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊。The method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles. 只有資料`applicationName`組態中指定，會傳回檔案。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`參數會指定是否只是匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔，或會搜尋所有設定檔。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔，與，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`傳回參數的值。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回，其中的零識別的第一頁的結果。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值是 1`pageSize`為 5，傳回會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個非使用中的設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作的方法簽章方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 如需完整的範例實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/CS/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/VB/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來擷取所有設定檔的設定檔資訊。The method is used to retrieve profile information for all profiles. 只有資料`applicationName`組態中指定，會傳回檔案。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`參數會指定是否只是匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔，或會搜尋所有設定檔。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 所傳回的結果會受限於`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數會識別哪一頁要傳回，其中的零識別的第一頁的結果。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters. 比方說，如果有 13 個使用者已設定`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值是 1`pageSize`為 5，傳回會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個非使用中的設定檔。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles returned. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作的方法簽章方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 如需完整的範例實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa). [!code-csharp[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/CS/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Profile.ProfileProvider/VB/odbcprofileprovidersnippets.vb#6)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來擷取所有未使用的使用者設定檔的計數。The method is used to retrieve a count of all unused user profiles. 只有資料`applicationName`組態中指定，會傳回檔案。Only data for the `applicationName` specified in the configuration file is returned. `authenticationOption`參數會指定是否只是匿名的設定檔，只會驗證設定檔，或會搜尋所有設定檔。The `authenticationOption` parameter specifies whether only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles are searched. 搜尋設定檔中，任何進行程式碼剖析，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值會計算。Of the searched profiles, any profile with a that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is counted. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作的方法簽章方法。The following code example shows the method signature for an implementation of the method. 如需完整的範例實作中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 建置並執行設定檔提供者範例](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa)。For an example of a full implementation, see [How to: Build and Run the Profile Provider Example](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90f65aa9-82dd-4a86-97e6-911037bd6cfa).
